docs.abstract: While microscopic and little known, predatory bacteria are among the world’s fiercest and most effective hunters.

docs.abstract: A rising generation of Republican stars offered an optimistic view of President Donald Trump's leadership on Monday, but were undermined on the opening night of the GOP's scaled-back convention by speakers issuing dark warnings about the country's future and distorting the president's record, particularly on the pandemic.
docs.snippet: A rising generation of Republican stars offered an optimistic view of President Donald Trump's leadership on Monday, but were undermined on the opening night of the GOP's scaled-back convention by speakers issuing dark warnings about the country's...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — A rising generation of Republican stars offered an optimistic view of President Donald Trump's leadership on Monday, but were undermined on the opening night of the GOP's scaled-back convention by speakers issuing dark warnings about the country's future and distorting the president's record, particularly on the pandemic.

headline.main: GOP Convention Showcases Rising Stars, Dark Warnings
headline.print_headline: GOP Convention Showcases Rising Stars, Dark Warnings

docs.abstract: Hurricane Marco and Tropical Storm Laura tore through the Caribbean and Gulf of Mexico on Sunday, forcing thousands of coastal residents in Louisiana and Cuba to flee, and flooding roads in Haiti's capital, with damage across the region expected to worsen this week.
docs.snippet: Hurricane Marco and Tropical Storm Laura tore through the Caribbean and Gulf of Mexico on Sunday, forcing thousands of coastal residents in Louisiana and Cuba to flee, and flooding roads in Haiti's capital, with damage across the region expected t...
docs.lead_paragraph: HOUSTON — Hurricane Marco and Tropical Storm Laura tore through the Caribbean and Gulf of Mexico on Sunday, forcing thousands of coastal residents in Louisiana and Cuba to flee, and flooding roads in Haiti's capital, with damage across the region expected to worsen this week.

headline.main: Thousands Evacuate as Dueling Storms Take Aim at U.S. Gulf Coast
headline.print_headline: Thousands Evacuate as Dueling Storms Take Aim at U.S. Gulf Coast

docs.abstract: Hong Kong reinfection, TikTok, Philippines explosions: Here’s what you need to know.
docs.snippet: Hong Kong reinfection, TikTok, Philippines explosions: Here’s what you need to know.
docs.lead_paragraph: A 33-year-old man was infected a second time more than four months after he initially contracted the coronavirus, a team at the University of Hong Kong said on Monday. After getting sick in Hong Kong in March, he tested positive on Aug. 15 after a trip to Spain via the United Kingdom, picking up a strain that was circulating in Europe in July and August.

docs.abstract: Democrats and Republicans chose Wisconsin and North Carolina, two battleground states that will help decide the Nov. 3 presidential election, to host their nominating conventions before the coronavirus forced them to scale back the events.
docs.snippet: Democrats and Republicans chose Wisconsin and North Carolina, two battleground states that will help decide the Nov. 3 presidential election, to host their nominating conventions before the coronavirus forced them to scale back the events.
docs.lead_paragraph: (Reuters) - Democrats and Republicans chose Wisconsin and North Carolina, two battleground states that will help decide the Nov. 3 presidential election, to host their nominating conventions before the coronavirus forced them to scale back the events.

headline.main: Factbox: Why North Carolina and Wisconsin, U.S. Political Convention Hosts, Matter for Trump and Biden
headline.print_headline: Factbox: Why North Carolina and Wisconsin, U.S. Political Convention Hosts, Matter for Trump and Biden

docs.abstract: Republicans this week are focused squarely on their convention's star, President Donald Trump, and securing his reelection in November. But there's also plenty of angling for what — or who — comes next.
